title: Soundless

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack an amount of players equal to the amount of whispers you made the previous day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are forced to attack if you have made a whisper.
- If you kill a member of the town, you will be dealt an unstoppable attack at the end of the following night
- Control / redirect immune.

desc:
Post 204
*Spoken words can leave you broken-hearted.*
